${ModID}:FalsePresent.NAME: False Present
${ModID}:FalsePresent.FLAVOR: Poor Ozma. She didn't know that lying adults don't approach others without reason.
DESCRIPTIONS: cards you draw each combat cost 0 until played.

${ModID}:Prescript.NAME: Prescript
${ModID}:Prescript.FLAVOR: A set of bizarre instructions. Who in their right mind would come up with these?
DESCRIPTIONS: NL Once completed, transforms into a special relic.

${ModID}:PrescriptsGrace.NAME: Prescript's Grace
${ModID}:PrescriptsGrace.FLAVOR: It all made sense now. All those pointless endeavours converged onto a single, definite meaning.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, randomly chooses between #yAttack, #ySkill, and #yPower. The first card played of the chosen type is played twice.
